## PaypalExpressTokenInput.use\_paypal\_credit property

Indicates whether the buyer clicked the PayPal credit button. The default value is false

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
use_paypal_credit?: Maybe<Scalars['Boolean']>;
```
